Generated Narrative: SearchParameter serviceRequest-patient-name

ServiceRequestPatientNameSearchParameter

Parameter patient-name:string

Searches for serviceRequest based on the patient's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?patient-name={name}

ResourceServiceRequest
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesServiceRequest
Multiples
  • multipleAnd: It's up to the server whether the parameter may repeat in order to specify multiple values that must all be true
  • multipleOr: It's up to the server whether the parameter can have multiple values (separated by comma) where at least one must be true

name: ServiceRequestPatientNameSearchParameter
description: Searches for serviceRequest based on the patient's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?patient-name={name}
